name: Emergency Situation - Fix That Ship!
description:
In Emergency Situation - Fix That Ship! you take the role of an engineer on a faulty space ship. For five minutes, you must race around your ship fixing various issues that pop up, so that you can safely return to Earth in one piece.

Please note that in this iteration of the game, you are only able to move - no hazards will be present.

Controls

Mouse: move cursorLeft Click: interact
WASD / Arrow Keys: move from room to room
